### Ingest
#### first sheet, skip 5 lines

```{r load-data, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, class.source='fold-hide'}


url_root <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UN-AVT/kamino-source/main/sources/0-shared/data/"
url_file <- "wdi-access-to-clean-cooking-fuel/wdi-access-to-clean-cooking-fuel.xlsx"
url <- paste0(url_root, url_file)

p1f <- tempfile()
download.file(url, p1f, mode="wb")
df<-read_excel(path = p1f, sheet = 1, skip = 5)

df


```
